coded_answer.p: Dear Helen:
Thank you for sending me this wonderful news. I was really happy when I knewlearned I won the first prize. I am writing to give you my details and ask for some more information.

Firstly, I would like to travel in July because I need to stay at home in August. I am a college student and I am going to study inat university this year. I will take my exams in June and have the resultresults in August. So I shall stay to prepare for my university.

Secondly, I prefer staying in log cabins so that I can have more chancechances to be with other people, then I can make more friends. During the camp, I will do singsinging and climbing activities. I enjoy singing all the time and I want to share my music with the others. I also like climbing because I like the view on the top of hills.
FinalyFinally, I want to know what the weather is like in California in July. Do I need some special clothes for the camp and how much money shall I bring for other expenses.?
I am looking forward to hearhearing from you.
Yours Sincerely.
